choices: The teacher gives you to one of the other students.
The teacher keeps you at her desk.
Some of the students have questions about you.
1.content:
Kieran stood at the front of the classroom, atop the teacher's desk.

"Why don't you tell us a bit about yourself" says Mrs. Brown.

Kieran gulped nervously. He could feel the eyes of everybody watching him. They were gigantic compared to him, utter goddesses. Their looks consisted of curiosity, wonder, disgust, awe and excitement. He felt weak and vulnerable. He didn't want to come here. He had begged his mother to allow him to stay home-schooled, but she insisted that it would allow him to finally have a social life and meet new people. He was so nervous.

"H-Hello. My name is K-Kieran McLoughlin. I-I was born w-with a c-c-condition that made me o-only t-t-two inches t-t-tall" he said, shyly. "I-I hope to b-b-be good f-f-friends" he added.

"Very good, Kieran" said Mrs. Brown. "Now..."
1.title: Introduction

11.content:
"Now, which one of you girls want to be his caretaker? Due to his small size, he will need help getting from class to class and such" says Mrs. Brown.

A few hands shoot in the air. Who will the teacher pick?
11.title: Who is it?

choices: The class goes on without interruptions
111.content:
"I'll take care of him" said Heather excitedly, sitting at the back of the class with her hand raised.

"Sure. Kieran, you'll be going with Heather" said Mrs. Brown. She picked him up and brought him over to Heather's desk before placing him back down. Heather was a young christian girl with dirty blond hair and glasses. Kieran looked up nervously at the beautiful face before him. She was absolutely gorgeous. However, Kieran was still scared, due to her massive size compared to him. The teacher began the lesson and Heather turned her attention towards her new little friend.

"Hey there, little Kieran" she cooed quietly, smiling down at him. To her, he looked like the most adorable thing she'd ever seen. "Don't be scared, I won't hurt you. You're far too adorable for anyone to hurt you".

Kieran blushed, feeling slightly comforted.
111.title: A Holy Goddess

After class ends, it's time for a fifteen minute break. After the break, you go to your next class. Kieran and Heather enjoy their break in the student lounge, getting to know each-other. Suddenly, Heather's stomach growls, which startles Kieran. Due to his size, what sounded like a small gurgle to Heather, sounded like thunder to him. He looks up nervously at her.

She giggles. "Don't worry. I'm not gonna eat you" she says. "Or will I?" she continues, giggling as she lifts you up to her face.

"I don't doubt you'd be delicious" she said, opening her mouth and showing it off. Kieran squirmed, scared that she was gonna eat him. She laughs and drops the act, placing Kieran back down on her lap.

"Oh, calm down. It's just a joke. You'd have to be really messed up in the head in order to eat someone, tiny or not".

She grabs an apple out of her lunch bag and begins eating it. Kieran sighs in relief that she wasn't going to eat him. His little sister had tried to eat him countless times, which had seriously traumatized him. His mom always stopped her, but it still deeply affected him. It was his biggest fear. He shook his head and decided to change the subject.

"S-So, w-what are your h-hobbies" he asked her.

She smiled. "Well, I like to watch movies quite a bit. I also enjoy listening to music and drawing".

"T-That's c-cool" he replied. "W-What kind of m-music do you l-l-listen to".

"Country, gospel, classical. Stuff like that. What about you" she asks.

"I usually listen to classic rock, metal, punk and things like that" he replied.

As for your family, I don't know much but my mom said something about your mom wanting to keep you away from your sister".

Kieran gave a weak smile. So, that was the reason his Mom had sent him there. It was to keep him away from being eaten by his sister. He smiled weakly, knowing that his mom truly had good intentions in her heart. He was still sad that he likely wouldn't be living with her again.

"Hey, Heather" she said.

"Oh, hey, Ashley" replied Heather.

"You know you're not allowed to have food in class, right?" said Ashley, eyeing Kieran.

He quickly ran towards Heather for safety, scared of what this other woman would do to him.

"What are you talking about? Kieran isn't food!" she retorted, placing her hands around Kieran protectively.

"Sure looks tasty to me" replied Ashley, licking her lips. "Why do you even care for it? It's not human. It's not like he's worth anything".

"Of course he's human"

"Oh really? Why's he so small then? It's not like he has any rights. He's worth little more than a bug. The most worth he'd ever have would be as food".

Heather was absolutely disgusted with what Ashley was saying. Her and Ashley were usually friends, but today that was changing with the discovery of how little Ashley cared for others.

"Go away, Ashley! Now!" she said.

"Fine! See ya later, religious freak" said Ashley, as she walked away.

Once Ashley was gone, Heather turned to Kieran. "I'm sorry about that, little guy" she said, petting him with her finger. "Just ignore her. She doesn't know what she's talking about".

115.content:
"Can I have him, Mrs. Brown" asked a girl in the front row with her hand raised. She was chubby and busty with long black hair and glasses.

"Sure, Maya" said the teacher. She took Kieran over to Maya's desk and placed him down on top of it, before walking back to the front of the class and beginning the lesson.

115.title: A Nerdy Giantess

A girl asks Kieran about his sister.
13.content:
"Now, any questions" asked Mrs. Brown. Several hands shot up in the air. "Yes, Heather".

"Why have you come to our school, you pervert?" asked Heather, accusingly.

Kieran was taken aback by this and hesitated to respond. Before he could say anything though, Mrs. Brown spoke.

"Heather, that is very rude and immature of you to say. I'm sure Kieran here would NEVER try to do anything perverted, right Kieran?"

Kieran stammered. "Y-Yes, M-M-Mrs. Brown" he replied. "As for the reason I came to an All-Girls school, my mother sent me here believing that you girls would be more gentle than other boys would".

"Alright, next question?" said Mrs. Brown. Several hands still remained up.

"Yes, Maggie" she called.

"What is life like at your size?" asked Maggie. "Like, how has your size effected how you go about your life".

Kieran stammered nervously. "W-Well, for one, it's rather hard to get around on my own. I usually need to have somebody carrying me around. I-It's also much scarier. There have been several times where I've been almost e-eaten, stepped on, sat on. And then there's my sister..." he paused. "But I'd rather not talk about her" he said.

Maggie's heart sunk as he spoke. She felt terrible for the little guy.

"Alright" said Mrs. Brown. "Anymore questions".

Maggie smiled as Mrs. Brown brought him over to her desk.

"Thank you so much!" she said. As the teacher went back to class and began to start the lesson, Maggie whispered to Kieran, petting his head with her finger. "You and I are going to be the best of friends" she said, softly. Other girls around her laughed at how affectionate she was being with their new classmate.

Kieran was nervous about all this, but Maggie seemed like a nice person. Her gentle touch was soothing as she pet his ginger haired head. She was also very beautiful.

"I-I-I'd love to" he responded. Maggie grinned from ear to ear before lifting Kieran up to her face and giving him a kiss.

1321.title: Looking For Love

info.brief_description: A tiny man is forced to go to an all-girl school. What could go wrong?
info.description:
Please add more chapters to this story. I am not nearly creative enough to write all of this on my own. I'll give 100 GP for new chapters.

Summary
Your name is Kieran McLoughlin. A 17 year old man with a rare birth condition that caused him to be only two inches in height. His parents forced him to go to an all-girl school, under the pretense that girls wouldn't be as rough as guys would.

Rules
1. No male giants.
2. No futas.
3. No furries.
4. No growing, expansion, transformation or anything like that.
5. Keep it in third person.
6. No other tinies.
7. No bad grammar.
8. Don't kill off Kieran unless you plan to end the story there. No changing tinies.
9. No scat/piss.
10. No excessive farting. Smells are okay, but nothing too over the top.

Guidelines
Kieran is a young, socially awkward teenager who's been homeschooled for most of his life. He doesn't really know how to talk to people, let alone girls. Please try to stay in-continuity with that fact. Thank you!
info.pretty_title: Tiny in an All-Girls School (PLEASE ADD)
